system.description: The character has mastered fighting with a pistol in one hand and a melee weapon in the other, coordinating their attacks with exceptional skill.
system.benefit: Character dual wielding a one-handed pistol and a melee weapon reduces the penalty for Two-Weapon Fighting by 10 (-20 to -10, or to +0 with Ambidextrous)

prerequisites.text: WS 40, BS 40, Two-Weapon Wielder (Ranged and Melee)

specialAbilities.name: Reduced Two-Weapon Fighting Penalty
specialAbilities.description: When dual wielding a one-handed pistol and a melee weapon, reduce the Two-Weapon Fighting penalty by 10 (from -20 to -10).
